SELECT permission.id , permission.deleted , permission.created_at as createdAt , permission.modified_at as modifiedAt
, permission.title , permission.content FROM permission WHERE permission.id = #{id}

SELECT permission.id FROM permission
ORDER BY permission.id permission.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
SELECT count(permission.id) as listsize FROM permission

SELECT permission.id FROM permission
AND #{cursor} > permission.id ORDER BY permission.id DESC
AND permission.id > #{cursor} ORDER BY permission.id ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
